name: Piglin Mayhem!
description:
Move your mouse to play the game.

Avoid piglins and use piglins with bombs to blow up other piglins.

After playing for a bit you can also get a sniper rifle.

Touch medkits to increase health.

Try to get a good highscore!

You can also look at the source code from here: https://github.com/N0t3nl1sh/PiglinMayhem
